Title: There are hard-coded values in theÂ code
Content:
There are hard-coded values in several Marmo contracts. For example, [65536](https://github.com/ripio/marmo-contracts/blob/d3fb5922a4f01e47d585343d08cccfad659b3584/contracts/MarmoStork.sol#L65) and [0xff](https://github.com/ripio/marmo-contracts/blob/d3fb5922a4f01e47d585343d08cccfad659b3584/contracts/MarmoStork.sol#L79). These values make the code harder to understand and to maintain.


Consider defining a constant variable for every hard-coded value, giving it a clear and explanatory name. For complex values, consider adding a comment explaining how were they calculated or why were they chosen.


***Update:*** *Partially fixed. Pull requests* [*#33*](https://github.com/ripio/marmo-contracts/pull/33) *and* [*#37*](https://github.com/ripio/marmo-contracts/pull/37) *fixed the two examples given in this issue. But there are still hard-coded values without explanation like* [*`32`*](https://github.com/ripio/marmo-contracts/blob/cbe0388bd7a624f8ca73d805af4d31c5d0b53960/contracts/Marmo.sol#L125) [*in*](https://github.com/ripio/marmo-contracts/blob/cbe0388bd7a624f8ca73d805af4d31c5d0b53960/contracts/Marmo.sol#L125)[*`Marmo.sol`*](https://github.com/ripio/marmo-contracts/blob/cbe0388bd7a624f8ca73d805af4d31c5d0b53960/contracts/Marmo.sol#L125) [*line 125*](https://github.com/ripio/marmo-contracts/blob/cbe0388bd7a624f8ca73d805af4d31c5d0b53960/contracts/Marmo.sol#L125)*,* [*`0x20`*](https://github.com/ripio/marmo-contracts/blob/cbe0388bd7a624f8ca73d805af4d31c5d0b53960/contracts/MarmoStork.sol#L82) [*in*](https://github.com/ripio/marmo-contracts/blob/cbe0388bd7a624f8ca73d805af4d31c5d0b53960/contracts/MarmoStork.sol#L82) [*`MarmoStork.sol`*](https://github.com/ripio/marmo-contracts/blob/cbe0388bd7a624f8ca73d805af4d31c5d0b53960/contracts/MarmoStork.sol#L82) [*line 82*](https://github.com/ripio/marmo-contracts/blob/cbe0388bd7a624f8ca73d805af4d31c5d0b53960/contracts/MarmoStork.sol#L82)*, and more.*
